title: 429. Make More Time to Sew (Even When You're Busy)
description:
We're going to be talking about an issue that plagues many quilters -- how to make more time to sew even when you're busy. Summer usually has our schedules packed, so Lindsay and Elizabeth give 5 ideas for squeezing more time in your sewing room! Then we tackle a listener question -- how to avoid bulk when many seams come together in your blocks. The staff shares what trends and designers they're loving right now. And we interview Emily Dennis, a quilt designer and author, who chats quilt alongs, photography tips, and keeping sewing simplified. To end, Elizabeth shares organization supplies you can find in the beauty aisle.
